ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'It would not matter if you were rock or iron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Tell them: "(Even if) you turn to stones or steel,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Tell them: "(You will be raised afresh even if) you turn to stone or iron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), say "Yes, even if you become rocks, iron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Let you be stones, or iron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Be ye stones or iron
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "[yes] even if you turned to stones or iron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: become ye stones or iron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘[That is bound to happen] even if you should become stones, or iron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "(Nay!) be ye stones or iron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW) "Be you stones or iron,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Let you be stones or iron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “Even if you become rocks or iron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:50] Say, to them: ‘Be stones or iron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to them, Muhammad: (Be ye stones) whether you are stones or something harder (or iron) or even stronger than iron,
